content.body: littledan (or anyone else): thoughts on the spec editors having discretion to declare a contribution as non-significant for the purposes of the IP agreement, instead of needing to ping contributors? I don't know if ecma's policies would allow that but it would be nice for stuff like https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/2863
